Title: Second Coming
Writer: Luke Kalteux, Sam Raimi (based on the characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Michelle Hurd
Plot: Ash, Ruby, and Kelly battle the past to secure a future where Pablo is alive and the world is safe from evil, but the family from hell has other plans.
